description: Snapshots are automatically marked as public after being taken.  Default behavior is that it should be locked down to the tenant, which it is and also marked as is_public = false.
title: snapshots are not private by default

comments.content: Snapshots are automatically marked as public after being taken.  Default behavior is that it should be locked down to the tenant, which it is and also marked as is_public = false.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~antonym

comments.content:
Hello Antony, or anyone else affected,

Accepted nova into oneiric-proposed, the package will build now and be available in a few hours. Please test and give feedback here. See https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/EnableProposed for documentation how to enable and use -proposed. Thank you in advance!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~pitti
